class tyr.lineage.core.ColumnList(columns=None)

Stores columns and column order

Parameters:

class tyr.lineage.core.OrderBy(columns: ColumnList, how: List[_Operator] = [])

Columns and direction to order a table or partition

Parameters:

  • how – List[lineage.core._Operator] - Operator must be in [lineage.operators.Ascending, lineage.operators.Descending]
